name: Duo Cube Racer
description:
How to play:

 The Duo Cube Racer is a co-op game that you and your mate play as cubes. 

You are trying to avoid the obstacles that is randomly generated. Game is easy to play with, it has 3 levels in one time. 
The floor colors determines that the difficulties of levels, the light yellow determines easy, 
the light blue determines medium and light red determines hard.

The game plays by 2 players.

The yellow player will be controlled with A and D keys and the Navy Blue player will be controlled with left and right arrow keys.
The goal is in this game is finishing the whole levels.
The challenge is trying to avoid obstacles that kills you.

P key will stop the game.
R key will restart the level.
ESC key will teleport you to the main menu.
